devdoc.details: Bklay is an abstracted token of klay. Bklay used as collateral for ledge1 BKlay = 1 klay

params.usr: Address of the user who execute the claim.
Owner of klay where unstaking was executed.

returns.completed: Amount of klay that can be claimed after 7 days of unstake.
returns.yet: Amount of klay that cannot be claimed as 7 days have not yet passed since unstake.

unstakeKlay(address,uint256).details: The function that executes unstake.Unstake takes 7 days to complete.Owner of klay is 'to'.

devdoc.title: Bonded Klay Contract

claimKlay(address).notice: Claim on every yield, send claimed klay to user.

stakeAKlay(address,uint256).notice: Stake aklay to yield factory, mint bklay.

stakeKlay(address).notice: Stake klay to yield factory, mint bklay.

unstakeKlay(address,uint256).notice: Unstake klay from yield factory, burn bklay.

userdoc.notice: Mint/Burn logic of Bklay via klay
